pages.text: $(li)The Bone Meal is a useful dust that can be used to grown any kind of $(l)Plant$() or $(l)Sappling$(). Just right click on them while you are holding Bone Meal in your hand to use it.$(br)$(li)It can be used to craft $(l)Bone Blocks$(), $(l)White Dye$() and $(l:patchouli:utility/supplementaries/planter)Planters$(/l) too.
$(li)You can use the $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/composter)Composter$(/l) to generate $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bone_meal)Bone Meal$(/l).

$(li)You can obtain $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bone_meal)Bone Meal$(/l) Smelting the Bones in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l) too.$(br)$(li)Finally, $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/blobfish)Blobfish$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/cod)Cods$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/environmental/koi)Kois$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/upgrade_aquatic/lionfish)Lionfish$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/upgrade_aquatic/perch)Perch$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/upgrade_aquatic/pike)Pikes$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/pufferfish)Pufferfish$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/salmon)Salmons$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/tropical_fish)Tropical Fish$(/l) may drop this item on death too.
